1307110.name: Snow Blower - Idle Game
1307110.description:
Blowing snow has never been more exciting!!!

With the help of trusty worker bots and your super charged snow blower, you'll blast that frosty goodness away and convert it into progression!

CUSTOM MAKE YOUR OWN DOUGHNUTS


Get Helper Robots, unlock upgrades, complete tasks, and watch the numbers rise!

Play minigames on your in-game CELLPHONE!


  • Play actively or passively
  • Blow snow virtually
  • Collect snowflakes
  • Collect doughnuts
  • Collect feathers
  • Upgrade your tools to blow snow more efficiently
  • Buy Robots and watch them do the work for you

AGAIN! you can custom make your own doughnuts!!!

Grab your Snow Blower NOW!
1307110.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 阿拉伯语*, 保加利亚语*, 捷克语*, 丹麦语*, 荷兰语*, 芬兰语*, 希腊语*, 匈牙利语*, 印度尼西亚语*, 日语*, 韩语*, 挪威语*, 波兰语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西*, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙*, 罗马尼亚语*, 俄语*, 简体中文*, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲*, 瑞典语*, 泰语*, 繁体中文*, 土耳其语*, 乌克兰语*, 越南语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
